title: How to Measure Something Using a Virtual Ruler with GetRuler.com

steps.headline: Go to the  virtual ruler home page.
Tune your screen using a driver's license or credit card.
steps.description: If you are using a tablet or mobile phone, you do not need to calibrate your screen.

steps.headline: Measure your item.
steps.description: Desktop users:  Place the object you want to measure next to any of the four sides of the screen. Tablets or cellphones: Use any size of your screen as a ruler to measure any item.

steps.headline: Adjust the scale as needed.
steps.description: If you want to measure in a different scale, select the appropriate tab:  centimeter, inch or pixel.
